sections: Test Suite Statistics (7 files, 94+ test methods)
Coverage Analysis by Module (game logic 100% target)

patterns_discovered: Comprehensive test suite with 94+ test methods across 7 modules
Test coverage targets: 95% for game logic, 85% project-wide (exceeds 80% requirement)
Performance validation included (< 100ms for flood fill on Expert board)
Randomized testing approach (1,000+ random games for first-click safety)
Test organization follows pytest best practices with clear naming conventions
Integration testing approach where game logic modules are tested collectively
Manual testing strategy for UI components due to Tkinter framework limitations
gotchas_discovered: Security policy blocks pytest execution in current environment
UI components cannot be unit tested due to Tkinter framework constraints
Manual verification required for end-to-end functionality testing
Test coverage estimation based on code review rather than actual pytest execution
Performance tests require specific timing validation on large boards (16x30 Expert)

approach_outcome.approach: Comprehensive testing strategy with code coverage analysis
validation_methods: Unit testing for all game logic modules

recommendations: Execute pytest commands when security policy allows to validate coverage estimates
Proceed with manual end-to-end testing (subtask-6-9) for UI verification
Maintain current test structure and quality standards
Consider adding integration tests between UI and game logic components
Document performance test methodology for future maintenance
Keep randomized testing approach for first-click safety validation
